name: DivoomTimesGate
0:
”Alexa, ask times gate to power on.”
”Alexa, ask times gate to increase the brightness.”
”Alexa, ask times gate to play my favorite pic.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: times gate
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Times Gate is a WiFi pixel art display with five lcd screens. It's a unique lighting decoration with a mobile companion APP. Through this APP, you can DIY and display your favorite pixel art animation. You can setup online information counter, and the Times Gate will automatically fetch the selected information, such as: YouTube channel followers, Game KDA scores, Twitch streaming info and more.

With the Amazon Alexa, you can command your times gate by asking Alexa with the following questions:
Required: times gate with WiFi network connected.
Screen control：
Alexa, ask times gate open screen
Alexa, ask times gate turn up
Alexa, ask times gate to wake up
Alexa, ask times gate close screen
Alexa, ask times gate turn off the screen
Alexa, ask times gate turn off the panel
Adjust the brightness：
Alexa, ask times gate increase the brightness
Alexa, ask times gate brightness increase
Alexa, ask times gate light up
Alexa, ask times gate lower the brightness
Alexa, ask times gate decrease the brightness
Alexa, ask times gate dim the light
Alexa, ask times gate the light is too bright
Switch clock:
Alexa, ask times gate display Overwatch clock
Alexa, ask times gate open Overwatch clock
Alexa, ask times gate Show the Bitcoin price
Alexa, ask times gate Show the Bitcoin clocks
Alexa, ask times gate Show a different message board
Alexa, ask times gate Show the USA stock
Alexa, ask times gate how many days away from Christmas
Alexa, ask times gate how many days away from Valentine's Day
Display picture:
Alexa, ask times gate display a dog
Alexa, ask times gate display a cat
Alexa, ask times gate display mario
Alexa, ask times gate display car
Alexa, ask times gate display bird
Alexa, ask times gate display city
Alexa, ask times gate display cow
Alexa, ask times gate display tree
Alexa, ask times gate display bridge
Play Recommended Animation:
Alexa, ask times gate to play recommended gallery
Alexa, ask times gate to Play popular gallery
Alexa, ask times gate to Play something cool
Alexa, ask times gate to show some animations
Alexa, ask times gate to show the HOT channe
Alexa, ask times gate to Play something fun
Play Favorite Animation:
Alexa, ask times gate to play my favorite pic
Alexa, ask times gate to play my favorite gif
Alexa, ask times gate switch to my favorites
Alexa, ask times gate to play my favorite
Play Subscription Animation:
Alexa, ask times gate to play subscription pic
Alexa, ask times gate to Play something I liked
Alexa, ask times gate to Show something I liked
Alexa, ask times gate to play my followed artists gallery
Alexa, ask times gate to show my followed artists gallery
